title: Statements about the payment of rent
context: Tell a new tenant exactly what day their monthly payment is due.

content.bestLine: Your monthly payment is due on the 1st of each month.

neutral.text: Rent is due on the first day of the month.
The monthly payment is due on the 1st.
You need to pay rent by the first of the month.
The due date for monthly rent is the 1st.
Rent payments are due on the first day of each month.
Your monthly rent payment is due on the 1st.
The monthly rent is payable on the first of the month.
You should pay your rent on the 1st of the month.

formal.text: Please be advised that rent is due on the 1st of each month.
The monthly rent payment is payable on the first day of the month.
It is essential to note that the due date for rent is the 1st.
Rent payments must be made on or before the 1st of the month.
The rent is due and payable on the first day of each month.
You are required to pay your monthly rent on the 1st.

patterns.template: Your monthly payment is due on the [day] of each month.
patterns.meaning: Specify the due date for monthly payments

patterns.template: Rent is payable on the [day] of the month.
options: last day of the previous month
patterns.meaning: Indicate when the rent is due

dialogs.description: Landlord informing a new tenant about the rent due date

lines.speaker: Landlord
lines.text: Hello, welcome to our building. I just wanted to remind you that your monthly payment is due on the 1st of each month.

lines.speaker: Tenant
lines.text: Thank you for letting me know. I'll make sure to pay on time.

dialogs.description: Tenant inquiring about the rent due date

lines.speaker: Tenant
lines.text: Hi, I just moved in and I was wondering when my monthly rent is due?

lines.speaker: Landlord
lines.text: Your monthly payment is due on the 1st of each month. You can pay by check or online through our website.
